doc_description: Constitutional amendments: state; permissible uses of school aid funds; revise. Amends sec. 11, art. IX of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS
Legislature: legislators; requirements for bill passage; modify. Amends sec. 26, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
Legislature: sessions; sine die; establish as the Friday before the first Monday in November in an even numbered year.Last Action: joint resolution electronically reproduced 01/26/2021

Constitutional amendments: state; equal amount of per pupil revenue for school operating purposes for all local school districts; ensure by certain date. Amends sec. 11, art. IX of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS
Individual income tax: rate; graduated income tax; allow. Amends sec. 7, art. IX of the state constitution. Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON FINANCE

Constitutional amendments: state; state board of education, superintendent of public instruction, and state board for public community and junior colleges; eliminate, and provide for a governor-appointed department director. Amends secs. 3 & 7, art. VIII of the state constitution.Last Action: joint resolution electronically reproduced 02/10/2021

Legislature: legislators; legislator pay, term limits, and requirements for bill passage; modify. Amends secs. 16 & 27, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Legislature: sessions; legislature to conduct session and committee meetings remotely; allow during certain emergencies. Amends secs. 13, 14, 17, 20 & 21, art. IV of the state constitution. Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Legislature: sessions; sine die; establish as the Friday before the first Monday in November in an even numbered year, with certain exceptions allowed. Amends secs. 13 & 26, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
Legislature: other; application for a convention of the states under article V of the United States Constitution; provide for.Last Action: joint resolution electronically reproduced 04/27/2021
Legislature: other; authority of the legislature to take up ballot initiatives; eliminate.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 05/12/2021

Higher education: governing boards; open meetings for university boards; require. Amends sec. 4, art. VIII of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON EDUCATION AND CAREER READINESS

Public employees and officers: other; certain state employee communications with members of the legislature; protect under certain circumstances. Amends the state constitution by adding sec. 9 to art. XI.Last Action: postponed for the day
Constitutional amendments: state; deadlines for proposed amendments to the state constitution; modify.Last Action: referred to second reading

Civil rights: affirmative action; governmental preferences for race, sex, color, ethnicity, and national origin; allow. Amends sec. 26, art. I of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 06/24/2021

Legislature: other; authority of the legislature to take up ballot initiatives; eliminate. Amends sec. 9 of art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Civil rights: affirmative action; prohibition of certain affirmative action programs; repeal. Repeals sec. 26, art. I of 1963 of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
Elections: primary; voting age at primary election; revise to 17 under certain circumstances. Amends sec. 1, art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 06/29/2021

Civil rights: sexual orientation discrimination; certain references to marriage; make gender neutral. Amends sec. 1, art. X & repeals sec. 25, art. I  of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 07/01/2021

Children: other; consideration of best interests of the child in all parental termination cases, child custody cases, and out-of-home placement cases; require. Amends the state constitution by adding sec. 28 to art. I.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON FAMILIES, SENIORS, AND VETERANS
Civil rights: other; involuntary servitude for the punishment of crime; prohibit. Amends sec. 9, art. I of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON JUDICIARY AND PUBLIC SAFETY
Higher education: governing boards; open meetings for university boards; require. Amends sec. 4, art. VIII of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 11/30/2021
Criminal procedure: bail; cash bail payments; prohibit. Amends secs. 15 & 16, art. I of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 11/30/2021

Public employees and officers: other; certain state employee communications with members of the legislature; protect under certain circumstances. Amends the state constitution by adding sec. 9 to art. XI.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 12/14/2021

Elections: school; voting age for school district elections; revise to 16 years of age under certain circumstances. Amends sec. 1, art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON ELECTIONS

Public employees and officers: other; binding arbitration; require for all employees in the classified state civil service. Amends sec. 5, art. XI of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Legislature: other; three-fourths majority vote of the legislature to enact law proposed by initiative; require. Amends sec. 9, art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Individual income tax: retirement or pension benefits; collection of taxes on pensions; prohibit. Amends sec. 7, art. IX of the state constitution.Last Action: joint resolution electronically reproduced 02/03/2022

Public employees and officers: other; binding arbitration; require for all employees in the classified state civil service. Amends sec. 5, art. XI of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 02/23/2022

Legislature: committees; constitutional amendment to create a bipartisan, bicameral oversight committee to review departmental or agency audits and reports provided by the auditor general; create. Amends sec. 53, art. IV & adds sec. 55 to art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT
Elections: primary; voting age at primary election; revise to 17 under certain circumstances. Amends sec. 1, art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON ELECTIONS

Elections: school; voting age for school district elections; revise to 16 years of age under certain circumstances. Amends sec.1, art. II of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 02/24/2022
Courts: judges; age limit for election of or appointment to a judicial office; amend. Amends sec.19, art. VI of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 03/23/2022
Constitutional amendments: state; permissible uses of school aid funds; revise. Amends sec. 11, art. IX of the state constitution.Last Action: REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Legislature: legislators; term limits for state legislators; revise, and require annual financial disclosures by state legislators. Amends secs.10 & 54, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: filed with Secretary of State 05/13/2022 11:13 AM

Legislature: apportionment; independent citizens redistricting commission; abolish. Amends sec. 1, art. IV, secs, 1, 2 & 4, art. V, secs. 1 & 4, art. VI & adds secs. 6a & 6b to art. IV & repeals sec. 6, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 05/11/2022

Legislature: sessions; unicameral nonpartisan legislature; provide for. Amends sec. 9, art. II, sec. 8, art. III, secs. 1, 6, 7, 8, 11, 12, 14, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 22, 24, 26, 27, 29, 30, 31, 33, 37, 43, 53 & 54, art. IV, secs, 2, 3, 6, 7, 13, 18, 20, 25, 26, 28 & 29, art. V, secs. 1 & 25, art. VI, sec. 6, art VIII, secs. 3, 15 & 27, art. IX, sec. 5, art. X, secs. 5 & 7, art. XI, secs. 1 & 3, art. XII; adds sec. 1a, to art. IV & repeals secs. 2, 3 & 21, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 05/18/2022

Elections: school; election of state board of education members from congressional districts; require. Amends sec. 3, art. VIII of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 06/14/2022
Civil rights: other; involuntary servitude for the punishment of crime; prohibit. Amends sec. 9, art. I of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 10/12/2022

Gaming: horse racing; expansion of gambling on the results of horse races; amend constitution to allow. Amends sec. 41, art. IV of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 11/10/2022

State: interstate compacts and agreements; certain nondisclosure agreements entered into by interstate compact entities; prohibit. Amends sec. 5, art. III of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 11/10/2022

State: other; state control of certain electric and natural gas utilities; require. Amends secs. 15 & 29, art. VII & adds sec. 31 to art. V of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 11/30/2022
Civil rights: affirmative action; prohibition of certain affirmative action programs; repeal. Repeals sec. 26, art. I of the state constitution.Last Action: printed joint resolution filed 12/01/2022
